27/365: Sick day

27.01.2011

“Oh, well, of course everything looks bad if you remember it.”

If a hallucinating Homer Simpson talking to a space coyote voiced by Johnny Cash isn't going to make me feel better, nothing will.

Best. Episode. Ever.
